Header: President, honoured with BIMSTEC Chairmanshipwarmly greeted at the Airport
Content: President Maithripala Sirisena who participated in the Fourth BIMSTEC Summit and was honoured with the BIMSTEC Chairmanship has returned to the island. President Maithripala Sirisena and his delegation reached the Katunayake International Airport last night. The President who was honoured with the BIMSTEC Chairmanship was accorded a very warm welcome at the Airport on his arrival. The President was thereafter conducted to the Guests Room where religious observances were conducted to shower blessings on him. Many Parliamentarians joined the occasion. In the meantime after the conclusion of the BIMSTEC Summit the President joined in a two day tour of Nepal where he held bilateral discussions with the President and the Prime Minister of Nepal. Several agreements were reached to further strengthen economic, social and cultural relations between the two countries. Two MOUâ€™s were signed to upgrade cooperation with respect to youth and public service training activities.
